reqs:
HIST 321A restricted to 3rd History honours students.
Life-Writing: Approaching History Through Memoirs, Diaries and Other Ego-Texts. This tutorial will examine aspects of life-writing by men and women in Europe, Asia and North America from the seventeenth to the twentieth century. We will examine how diaries, memoirs and autobiographies come to be written and preserved and how historians use (or misuse) such source material.
